name: Bunny adventure
description: Bunny adventure is fun, casual platformer for all ages.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Card with OpenGL support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 280 MB available space
